item.title: World central bank chiefs 'stand in solidarity' with US Fed chair Powell
item.description: Eleven central banks have backed Jerome Powell after the US launched a criminal investigation into the US Fed.

item.title: Crackdown on illegal working leads to surge in arrests
item.description: Raids on businesses such as nail bars and takeaways have increased by 77% since Labour took office, the government says.

item.title: 'Miracle baby' born in a tree above Mozambique floodwaters dies aged 25
item.description: Rosita Salvador Mabuiango's mother was sheltering for days before giving birth perched above the water.

item.title: Carrick to bring in Holland as Man Utd assistant
item.description: Michael Carrick agrees to become Manchester United interim head coach - and former England assistant manager Steve Holland is set to be his number two...

item.title: Le Pen's political fate rests on appeal trial opening in France
item.description: The head of her far-right party, Jordan Bardella, warns banning her running for president would be "deeply worrying" for democracy.
